name: Merak Peep Data File
summary: Learn about .PEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: Stores data models and reports created with Merak Peep, a petroleum economic evaluation program; used to create "What if" scenarios, analyze risks and market sensitivity, forecast production levels, and estimate reserves.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pex file in PopCap Games Peggle Extreme
images.caption: PEX file open in PopCap Games Peggle Extreme
